SPA.title: Spa Services
SPA.title_1: Dog or Cat Full Spa Treatment
SPA.paragraph_1: Bath, massage, full grooming of hair and nails (comes with a take home bath kit and animal treats).
SPA.paragraph_2: Massaging of the paws, thighs, head and of course, behind the ears (comes with animal treats).
SPA.title_3: Doggy Facial and Fur Cleanse Treatment
SPA.paragraph_3: Dogs receive a facial with our vegan, cruelty free face products and cleansing of any dirt left hiding in their beautiful fur (comes with a take home face products and animal treats).
SPA.title_4: Cat Facial and Fur Cleanse Treatment
SPA.paragraph_4: Cat receives a facial with our vegan, cruelty free face products and cleansing of any dirt left hidding in their fur (comes with a take home face products and animal treats).
SPA.title_5: Cat and Dog Swim Spa Retreat
SPA.paragraph_5: Take your animal on an amazing journey retreat in the woods with a scratch proof tent, feline repellant protector and sticks galore (for dogs, of course). There is a sauna that is for the animal owners and a smaller bath for your pets (comes with a cute animal raincoat and boots).

BLOG.title: The Bark Chronicles
BLOG.subtitle: Where To Read All About The Bark!
BLOG.card_title_1: Rex, The Dog Who Never Stops Playing ... Ever
BLOG.card_description_1: Sometimes it is difficult to get dogs interested in the toys you buy for them. .. Luckily for Rex, everything he sees is a potential toy for him! Never let him around your valuables or any socks. He will steal them and you will never see them again...
BLOG.card_description_2: One day, we started noticing Rex was ripping apart all of our sheets when he was bored except for this blanket over here. Rex decided to spare this ugly white blanket that my grandmother gave me from her war days. We never threw it away because we felt bad. Seeing Rex sleep on this blanket made us happy. At least someone was using this blanket, even if we had to rebuy brand new sheets because we have such an amazing dog.

ABOUT.title: About Us
ABOUT.subtitle: Our Owners Love Dogs and Cats Only
ABOUT.description_1: Here at Luxe Animal Spa we aim to provide you with the best service possible for both you and your pet! We pride ourselves in offering a true first-class experience.
ABOUT.description_secondary_1: Our grooming equipment is top quality.  We use only the most trusted brands in the industry which provides a beautiful, calming, and safe salon experience for your pets.
ABOUT.description_2: All animals deserve a special spa pampering treatment, but mostly cats and dogs. Luxe Animal Spa offers the best spa treatments to leave your pets feeling amazing!
ABOUT.description_secondary_2: We are the first in Canada to offer spa treatments for cats and dogs. This is unheard of in many places so come, bring your amazing cat or dog and let us make their spa experience something they will never forget!

CONTACT.title: Contact
CONTACT.desciprition_1: For customer service inquiries, please email us at
CONTACT.desciprition_2: For spa inquiries, please include your animal’s name for faster service. For your protection, please do not include your credit card or banking information details in your email.
